description:
BCDiploma develops a turnkey application for higher education institutions and their graduates.

BCDiploma dematerializes and automates the issuance of certified diplomas and certificates: a major and lasting advantage, in addition to a "blockchain" security level.

BCDiploma provides the graduate with a unique URL link: over his/her entire life, he/she will be able to prove the authenticity of his/her diploma.
name: BCdiploma-EvidenZ
